gameinterfaces

Interface Room

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TreasureRoom

    public interface Room
    A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes:
    • roomIndex: int
    • description: String
    • monster: Monster
    The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Room(int roomIndex, String description, Monster monster)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enter(Player player)
      This method will display the message:

      "player name" "This Room is this.description, and has this.monster"

      If the monster isAlive() allow the player to enter the room and start a battle
      boolean isComplete()
      This method returns true if the Monster in this Room has died.
      java.lang.String toString() 

    • Method Detail

      • isComplete

        boolean isComplete()
        This method returns true if the Monster in this Room has died.
        Returns:
        true if this Room monster !isAlive(), false otherwise.

      • enter

        void enter(Player player)
        This method will display the message:

        "player name" "This Room is this.description, and has this.monster"

        If the monster isAlive() allow the player to enter the room and start a battle
        Parameters:
        player - entering the room

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A String formatted as follows:

        "Room index %2d, description %20s, monster name %20s"
